links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = binomial(n+6, 6)*A000984(n+6)/A000984(6), where A000984 are the central binomial coefficients. - _Wolfdieter Lang_a(n) = (2*n+11)*(2*n+9)*(2*n+7)*(2*n+5)*(2*n+3)*(2*n+1)*Binomial(2*n, n)/10395. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013n*a(n) - 2*(2*n+11)*a(n-1) = 0. [_Bruno Berselli_, Jul 05 2013]
prog: (MAGMA) [&*[2*n+i: i in [1..11 by 2]]*Binomial(2*n, n)/10395: n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
